ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 211
ygData.msgSnippet: In response to Chuck.... can t guarantee if it s a scam or not but I can say if it was real it sure as hell is worth alot more than what he is asking. If that
ygData.messageBody:
In response to Chuck.... can't guarantee if it's a scam or not
but I can say if it was real it sure as hell is worth alot more than what he
is asking. If that is real its a very good deal. With the CoF costing around
120K on my server and plat selling at 100 bucks per 10000 plat this item is
a steal. I say again it may be a scam it may not but ya don't need to flame
people just cause they might spend real cash on an item. And think how long
it would take to earn that or the time needed to raise a level high enough
to challenge a dragon and "hope" to win a roll for it. Plus there 10000 plat
in the deal too.

Just my 2 cents take it as you all like :) but if real its a great deal.




----- Original Message -----
From: Chuck <lancilot2000@...>
To: <EQCheats@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 13, 2001 4:03 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 211


> If anyone even thinks about sending this guy 250 real dollars for
> this stuff, then maybe you should be admitted. And the guy actually
> posting this post, you must have rocks in your head to expect that
> kind of money for some inanimate items in some game. Get real
> pal, how about I just send you my paycheck every week, NOT.
>
> Anyway, don't be stupid people and fall for scams like this, which is
> all they are.
>
> P.S. This is not a cheat, it is a scam and does not belong here. Maybe
> you can't accept paypal cause you screwed too many people out of
> their hard earned money and they kicked you off their service. Or could
> be that it is almost impossible to get money back from someone if you
> pay them by money order.
>
